channel.title: CVE Feed for PrestaShop -- productcomments
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PrestaShop -- productcomments

item.title: CVE-2022-35933|2024-08-03T09:51:59.085Z -- prestashop -- productcomments
item.description: This package is a PrestaShop module that allows users to post reviews and rate products. There is a vulnerability where the attacker could steal an administrator's cookie. The issue is fixed in version 5.0.2.
